item.description:
This event is a practice session for English pronunciation.  I'll work with people individually to improve their pronunciation.

Please sign up only if you are actually going to come, so I know how many people to look for.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have a sign on the table that says "ESL." I will also send the number for my mobile phone to anyone who signs up before 5:30PM.

group.name: The Boston English as a Second Language Meetup Group

item.name: English Pronunciation
